Namun, apabila Madi menyedari bahawa CIkgu Sofi mempunyai sifatlemah lembut terhadap Uzair, Madi menyerang dan menyakiti Cikgu Sofi.

programme.title: Bara Jiwa Ep2
programme.desc: Uzair menyerang Madi dengan ganas. Madi dimasukkan ke hospital dalam keadaan koma, Uzair dihantar untuk pemulihan. Uzair menumpukan perhatian kepada SPM. Dia pergi untuk melindungi Ajeeb daripada Hatta yang membawa kepada lebih banyak pergaduhan. Imran membalas dendam terhadap Uzair dengan memanipulasi Asyikin untuk menjadi GRO.

programme.title: Taxi 3
programme.desc: Sekumpulan pencuri yang menggelarkan diri mereka sebagai Geng Santa Claus sedang menimbulkan kekacauan, dan polis tidak dapat mengejarnya. Kapten polis Gilbert terganggu oleh seorang wartawan Cina yang menulis cerita tentang skuadnya, isteri detektif Emilien baru sahaja mengumumkan bahawa dia hamil, dan pemandu teksi Daniel sedang mengalami krisis hubungan. Selepas rentetan kesilapan di mana pencuri mengakali polis berkali-kali dengan wartawan di sana untuk merakam semuanya, Daniel dan teksi supernya masuk.

programme.title: Chantek
programme.desc: Chantek, seorang pembantu rumah dari Indonesia yang terpaksa menyamar sebagai lelaki untuk menenteramkan AD yang masih fobia dengan perempuan. Lama-kelamaan kerana kebaikan AD dan kemesraan mereka berdua, Chantek terpaksa mendedahkan rahsianya. Walaupun marah, AD sedia memaafkannya kerana kejujuran Chantek membantu memulihkannya dan akhirnya mereka berdua telah jatuh cinta. Namun hati Chantek berubah setelah dia terasa dipergunakan oleh AD sebagai bahan latihan filemnya. Berjayakah AD bertemu dan memenangi hati Chantek kembali?

programme.title: Usop Wilcha Menghonjang Makhluk Muzium
programme.desc: Mengisahkan sebuah muzium yang ingin mengadakan satu pameran Hantu-Hantu Dunia untuk menarik minat pengunjung. Tanpa disedari, penganjuran pameran ini mempunyai matlamat tersendiri. Melalui perancangan licik sekumpulan pengamal ilmu hitam dari Romania, pameran ini sebenarnya ingin menghidupkan kembali Raja Dracula. Mengikut kepercayaan kumpulan ini, Raja Dracula akan dapat hidup kembali dengan mendapatkan darah manusia dari setia

programme.title: 4 Madu
programme.desc: Azlan, seorang pekerja biasa di sebuah chalet telah menerima surat yang memintanya hadir ke pejabat guaman di Kuala Lumpur. Setibanya di ibu kota, Azlan telah diperkenalkan dengan adik tirinya, Azrul untuk pertama kali dalam hidupnya. Di pejabat guaman itu, Encik Zahrin Ishak membacakan wasiat yang ditinggalkan oleh arwah ayah mereka. Segala harta yang bernilai 50 juta ringgit akan menjadi hak milik mereka sekiranya mereka dapat memenuhi syarat-syarat yang terkandung dalam wasiat itu. Antara perkara yang perlu dilaksanakan ialah, mereka berdua harus mencari isteri dalam tempoh 3 minggu serta calon isteri itu mestilah seorang anak yatim piatu.

programme.title: Putar Alam
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Jeff, Aida dan Ben yang gemar menipu orang untuk mendapatkan wang di Kuala Lumpur. Mereka kemudiannya diupah oleh seseorang untuk mendapatkan saham di sebuah syarikat. Sasaran mereka kali ini ialah Nora, seorang wanita yang baru menjadi pengurus di syarikat itu. Pelbagai kejadian lucu berlaku semasa Jeff mendekati Nora sehingga mereka berdua jatuh cinta.

programme.title: Buli
programme.desc: Nordin sering dibuli oleh Roy sejak zaman kanak-kanak lagi. Dia yang kini seorang pereka perisian komputer membesar dengan keyakinan diri yang rendah namun bertekad untuk tidak lagi ditindas. Dia sering mengalami mimpi-mimpi dengan senario yang aneh. Nordin kemudiannya bertemu dengan Dr. Ika yang ingin membantunya. Pelbagai insiden terjadi yang akhirnya telah mengubah hidup Nordin dan pembulinya.

programme.title: Chantek
programme.desc: Chantek, seorang pembantu rumah dari Indonesia yang terpaksa menyamar sebagai lelaki untuk menenteramkan AD yang masih fobia dengan perempuan. Lama-kelamaan kerana kebaikan AD dan kemesraan mereka berdua, Chantek terpaksa mendedahkan rahsianya. Walaupun marah, AD sedia memaafkannya kerana kejujuran Chantek membantu memulihkannya dan akhirnya mereka berdua telah jatuh cinta. Namun hati Chantek berubah setelah dia terasa dipergunakan oleh AD sebagai bahan latihan filemnya. Berjayakah AD bertemu dan memenangi hati Chantek kembali?

programme.title: Nana Tanjung
programme.desc: Seorang duda bernama Nana Kassim membesarkan tiga orang anak perempuannya di Pulau Pinang. Seorang pemuda bernama Akhbar Khan jatuh cinta dengan Khairunisa, anak sulung Nana. Akhbar sanggup menjadi pengawal peribadi Nana untuk selalu berjumpa kekasihnya itu. Pada masa yang sama dia mendapat tahu bahawa Nana mempunyai rancangan lain untuk perkahwinan Khairunisa. Untuk meyakinkan Nana supaya mereka boleh mengahwini pasangan pilihan masing-masing, Akhbar bersama anak-anak Nana memujuknya supaya berkahwin dengan Mami Mumtaz, kekasih lamanya.

programme.title: Siapa Tak Sayang Bini
programme.desc: Mengisahkan kekalutan dua keluarga iaitu Kassim, seorang suami yang garang dan suka mengawal isterinya, Kamisah dan juga Karim, seorang suami yang lembut hati namun dikawal isterinya yang garang, Kasmah. Segalanya bermula apabila Kassim berpindah ke sebelah rumah Karim. Pasangan kaki kontrol cuba menjadi guru dengan mengajar pasangan masing-masing. Keadaan menjadi bertambah kecoh dengan kehadiran Saiful, lelaki bujang yang suka menyibuk hal orang lain. Siapakah yang berjaya mengawal pasangan masing-masing?

programme.title: Buli
programme.desc: Nordin sering dibuli oleh Roy sejak zaman kanak-kanak lagi. Dia yang kini seorang pereka perisian komputer membesar dengan keyakinan diri yang rendah namun bertekad untuk tidak lagi ditindas. Dia sering mengalami mimpi-mimpi dengan senario yang aneh. Nordin kemudiannya bertemu dengan Dr. Ika yang ingin membantunya. Pelbagai insiden terjadi yang akhirnya telah mengubah hidup Nordin dan pembulinya.

programme.title: Kidnap
programme.desc: Mengisahkan hidup Sherry yang sering dikongkong oleh bapanya. Hal ini membuatkan jiwa Sherry memberontak dan ingin mencari kebebasan dalam hidup. Sherry kemudiannya jatuh cinta dengan seorang lelaki bernama Roy. Namun, bapa Sherry tidak merestui cinta mereka dan tidak membenarkan Sherry untuk keluar daripada rumah lagi. Dengan bantuan Zul, bapa Sherry merancang sesuatu untuk merenggangkan hubungan Sherry dengan Roy. Tetapi Roy dan Sherry membalasnya dengan satu penculikan palsu untuk menyedarkan bapa Sherry tentang erti kasih sayang yang sebenar.

programme.title: Chantek
programme.desc: Chantek, seorang pembantu rumah dari Indonesia yang terpaksa menyamar sebagai lelaki untuk menenteramkan AD yang masih fobia dengan perempuan. Lama-kelamaan kerana kebaikan AD dan kemesraan mereka berdua, Chantek terpaksa mendedahkan rahsianya. Walaupun marah, AD sedia memaafkannya kerana kejujuran Chantek membantu memulihkannya dan akhirnya mereka berdua telah jatuh cinta. Namun hati Chantek berubah setelah dia terasa dipergunakan oleh AD sebagai bahan latihan filemnya. Berjayakah AD bertemu dan memenangi hati Chantek kembali?

programme.title: Tesis
programme.desc: Azira menemani Fatin ke negeri Pahang untuk menyiapkan kajian tesisnya tentang industri pelancongan di sana. Ketika membuat rakaman di sebuah pantai, mereka ternampak dua orang lelaki membuang tubuh seorang wanita ke dalam laut. Mereka berdua kemudiannya dikejar oleh penjahat itu namun dapat melepaskan diri dan segera membuat laporan polis tentang kejadian itu. Fatin yang masih ketakutan itu ingin pulang ke Kuala Lumpur namun Azira meyakinkannya bahawa keadaan mereka selamat dan polis akan memberi bantuan sekiranya mereka diganggu. Seperti yang Fatin jangka, penjahat itu kini mengekorinya sehingga dia dan Fatin melarikan diri ke dalam hutan. Tanpa disedari, mereka berdua telah terperangkap dalam satu sindiket.

programme.title: Nana Tanjung
programme.desc: Seorang duda bernama Nana Kassim membesarkan tiga orang anak perempuannya di Pulau Pinang. Seorang pemuda bernama Akhbar Khan jatuh cinta dengan Khairunisa, anak sulung Nana. Akhbar sanggup menjadi pengawal peribadi Nana untuk selalu berjumpa kekasihnya itu. Pada masa yang sama dia mendapat tahu bahawa Nana mempunyai rancangan lain untuk perkahwinan Khairunisa. Untuk meyakinkan Nana supaya mereka boleh mengahwini pasangan pilihan masing-masing, Akhbar bersama anak-anak Nana memujuknya supaya berkahwin dengan Mami Mumtaz, kekasih lamanya.

programme.title: Karipap Karipap Cinta
programme.desc: Ali bekerja sebagai jurufoto di syarikat penerbitan majalah jatuh hati kepada Sarah, seorang lulusan Universiti Al-Azhar. Ali panik apabila rakan serumahnya memberitahu keluarga Sarah ingin menjodohkannya dengan seorang ustaz. Untuk memenangi hati Sarah dan keluarganya, Ali terpaksa berbohong dengan mengatakan dia juga merupakan seorang graduan Universiti Al-Azhar. Dalam masa yang sama bos Ali, Dato' Razali Bunari cuba mendedahkan satu skandal yang turut melibatkan bapa Sarah.

programme.title: Putar Alam
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Jeff, Aida dan Ben yang gemar menipu orang untuk mendapatkan wang di Kuala Lumpur. Mereka kemudiannya diupah oleh seseorang untuk mendapatkan saham di sebuah syarikat. Sasaran mereka kali ini ialah Nora, seorang wanita yang baru menjadi pengurus di syarikat itu. Pelbagai kejadian lucu berlaku semasa Jeff mendekati Nora sehingga mereka berdua jatuh cinta.

programme.title: Sepi
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tiga orang yang berasingan mengenal erti cinta, kehilangan dan kesepian. Adam, seorang tukang masak terkenal yang meluaskan kerjayanya dengan mereka hiasan untuk majlis perkahwinan. Tetapi, dengan segala kejayaan itu beliau masih membujang dan belum bertemu jodohnya sendiri. Sufi pula seorang lelaki yang sedang cuba melenyapkan memori kematian isterinya. Akhir sekali, Iman, seorang penulis muda yang menjadikan pentas teater sebagai tapak untuk memahami masa silamnya dan kupasan demi kupasan ke dalam masa depannya sendiri. Ketiga-tiga watak ini akhirnya terkait dalam satu insiden dramatik yang akan merubah kehidupan mereka buat selamanya.

programme.title: Usop Wilcha Menghonjang Makhluk Muzium
programme.desc: Mengisahkan sebuah muzium yang ingin mengadakan satu pameran Hantu-Hantu Dunia untuk menarik minat pengunjung. Tanpa disedari, penganjuran pameran ini mempunyai matlamat tersendiri. Melalui perancangan licik sekumpulan pengamal ilmu hitam dari Romania, pameran ini sebenarnya ingin menghidupkan kembali Raja Dracula. Mengikut kepercayaan kumpulan ini, Raja Dracula akan dapat hidup kembali dengan mendapatkan darah manusia dari setia

programme.title: Sayang Anakku Sayang
programme.desc: Lima beradik yang menjadi anak yatim piatu setelah kehilangan kedua ibu bapanya. Terpaksa berpisah dan diambil oleh keluarga angkat, abang sulung mereka teringat akan janji arwah ibunya untuk menjaga adik-adiknya lalu dia pergi mengambil mereka semula. Dibantu majikan bapanya yang terhutang budi, mereka berlima akhirnya bersama semula setelah diambil sebagai anak angkatnya.

programme.title: (L) Berita TVS@12
programme.desc: Berita TVS membawakan berita yang menyeluruh dan padat dengan perspektif yang lebihmenyegarkan.

programme.title: Rezeki Api Ep1
programme.desc: Fokus kulinari, dari dapur kayu kampung hingga peniaga bandar. Teknik api unik, suku kaum, kulinari bumi kenyalang. Lengkap tema semulajadi: air, tanah, udara (angin), & api.

programme.title: (L) Re Bao
programme.desc: Re Bao memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Mandarin

programme.title: Khazanah Kenyalang S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Dokumentari mengangkat 39 buah koleksi khazanah terbaik negeri Sarawak - yang tersimpan di Arkib Sarawak sebagai khazanah yang signifikan dan bertaraf dunia.

programme.title: Encang Pok Encang Ep1
programme.desc: DIN JERES, the schools badminton prodigy is destined to bring glory to his small kampung school. But one day, his shot at badminton glory was mercilessly crushed.

programme.title: Kedey Kita: Coklat Tempatan Ep3
programme.desc: Orden Syam will be at Sarawak day event and provide the platform for entrepreneur to promote their product and services.

programme.title: Halik Ep94
programme.desc: Childhood lovers Jacky and Lino meet after being apart for several years. However, now married to different people, the two must choose whether to fight to be together again or be true to the promise made to their spouses.

programme.title: Tanah Syurga Ep7
programme.desc: Kepulangan Andy ke Sarawak demi menjaga ibunya yang sakit disamping mengusahakan tanah pusaka peninggalan arwah ayah telah menimbulkan reaksi negatif abangnya, Jamal.

programme.title: (L) Berita TVS@4:55
programme.desc: Berita TVS membawakan berita yang menyeluruh dan padat dengan perspektif yang lebihmenyegarkan.

programme.title: Rezeki Tanah Ep7
programme.desc: TVS mempersembahkan siri dokumentari Rezeki Tanah yang mengisahkan kecekalan 13 orang insan yang sanggup berkotor dan merisikokan diri untuk mencari rezeki, tidak kira daripada hasil hutan mahupun cucuk tanam demi kelangsungan hidup dan keluarga tercinta.

programme.title: (L) Re Bao
programme.desc: Re Bao memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Mandarin

programme.title: Road To Sukma 2024 Ep2
programme.desc: Sebuah kapsul sukan yang dibawakan khas sempena Sukma Sarawak 2024

programme.title: Borneo's Unique Building Ep13
programme.desc: Siri dokumentari yang memfokuskan kepada senibina bangunan dan infrastruktur di Sarawak, yang menampilkan dua binaan iaitu satu senibina moden/kontemporari dan satu lagi senibina tradisi/kolonial.

programme.title: (L) Berita Iban TVS
programme.desc: Berita Iban memaparkan berita-berita terkini di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa Iban

programme.title: Sukan TVS S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Memaparkan laporan, perbincangan dan topik hangat sukan tanah air

programme.title: (DL) Menarik Sepuluh
programme.desc: Menarik Sepuluh mengumpulkan 10 kisah unik dan menarik berlaku di mana sahaja

programme.title: (L) UTAMA
programme.desc: UTAMA merupakan segmen berita utama yang memaparkan Berita Terkini di seluruh Malaysia dan dunia.

programme.title: Inspirasi Duniamu Hari Sarawak Ep1
programme.desc: Menginspirasi penonton dengan pelbagai isu semasa, komuniti, usaha kebajikan dan realiti kehidupan darisetiapsudut.

programme.title: Jelu Siga Ep1
programme.desc: Documentary about wildlife and endangered species in Borneo, focusing on habitat, personality, characteristics, public awareness, and various methods to save these species, derived from the Iban language.

programme.title: (L) TVS Nightline
programme.desc: Memaparkan laporan peristiwa yang berlaku di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa English

programme.title: Misteri Akil Balik
programme.desc: Kemunculan Akil di kampung halamannya semula telah menimbulkan persoalan orang kampung. Malah mereka merasakan sejak adanya Akil di kampung itu pelbagai perkara misteri berlaku. Terutamanya dua orang pemuda kampung yang nakal iaitu Oden dan Ucop kerana mereka merasakan sejak Akil muncul, Hani, Hanim dan Hanum sering tergila-gilakan Akil. Mereka berdua rasa tergugat.

programme.title: Jasmine

Untuk itu, walaupun diusia 33 tahun, Zaman masih sendiri. Hati Zaman terguris kala Jasmine menyatakan cintanya pada lelaki lain. Awal segala-gala pada Jasmine kerana Awal cinta pertamanya.

Salah seorang daripada mereka ialah bekas teman lelakinya, Surachart, yang tidak mahu kehilangannya lagi. Dan Suchat, seorang guru muda yang merupakan jirannya yang mempunyai ramai peminat di kampungnya dan ramai pemuda top di kampungnya adalah tip untuk memenangi pertandingan ini. Perlumbaan untuk mencapai kemenangan bukanlah mudah.

programme.title: Senjakala Di Manado
programme.desc: Johny WW Lengkong (Ray Sahetapy), seorang pelaut yang telah meninggalkan keluarganya selama hampir 20 tahun, berniat kembali ke Manado dengan harapan keluarganya mau memaafkannya. Namun ternyata istrinya telah meninggal dunia dan meninggalkan seorang anak bernama Pingkan (Mikha Tambayong). Johny pun berjanji akan merawat Pingkan, tetapi ternyata semua tidak berjalan dengan mudah. Pingkan merasa terganggu tatkala Johny mulai mencampuri urusan asmaranya dengan Brando (Fero Walandouw), kekasihnya, lantaran Johny merasa Brando bukan pria baik-baik. Dari situlah konflik antara ayah dan anak mulai terjadi.

programme.title: Batik Zakiah
programme.desc: Hidup Zakiah penuh dengan dugaan yang membuatkan dia merana. Zakiah telah mendirikan rumah tangga dan menjadi isteri kedua. Dia dilayan dingin oleh isteri pertama dan diperlakukan seperti orang gaji dirumahnya sendiri. Setelah melahirkan anak yang diberi nama Anum, Zakiah diceraikan dan anaknya diambil semasa umur 6 bulan. Kejadian itu menyebabkan Zakiah mengalami kemurungan dan meroyan. Hanya sehelai kain batik yang selalu digunakan untuk Anum sebagai pengubat rindu.

programme.title: Misteri Akil Balik
programme.desc: Kemunculan Akil di kampung halamannya semula telah menimbulkan persoalan orang kampung. Malah mereka merasakan sejak adanya Akil di kampung itu pelbagai perkara misteri berlaku. Terutamanya dua orang pemuda kampung yang nakal iaitu Oden dan Ucop kerana mereka merasakan sejak Akil muncul, Hani, Hanim dan Hanum sering tergila-gilakan Akil. Mereka berdua rasa tergugat.

programme.title: Variety Jom Wayang S13 Ep5
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep9
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Seblak Empire Hentikan Ledakan Cinta
programme.desc: Secantik, Airin tetapi dia tidak malu untuk menjual seblak. Pada awalnya Rendra agak kesal kerana Airin menjual seblak, tetapi semakin lama Rendra telah jatuh cinta kepada Airin.

programme.title: Eva
programme.desc: Seorang wanita yang dari kecil mengimpikan mempunyai kuasa ajaib seperti di miliki sahabatnya . Berhadapan dengan berbagai masalah akibat dirinya yang sering menyendiri dan cuba mencari identiti dirinya sendiri . Akhirnya beliau menyedari bahawa kelebihan yang diharapkannya sesuatu yang bakal memakan dirinya sendiri

programme.title: Sesalan Terakhir
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Natasha merupakan anak tidak sah taraf. Hidupnya tidak seperti orang lain. Dia dipinggirkan orang kampung kerana sikap ibunya, Auni, yang sering menjalinkan hubungan dengan lelaki kaya kerana ingin memiliki kekayaan. Puas Natasha menasihati ibunya supaya kembali ke jalan yang benar.

programme.title: Tmo Minyak Dagu
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Minyak Dagu

programme.title: Kawan Aku Mati Dalam Rumah Sewa Dia
programme.desc: Salah seorang rakan mereka secara tidak sengaja meninggal dunia di rumah mereka secara tidak sengaja. Apa yang mereka akan lakukan dengan mayat kawan mereka?

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep5
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Rinding
programme.desc: Yana ialah seorang pensyarah yang mempunyai imsonia. Dia dapat tidur malam selepas menonton video ASMR Suraya. Yana ingin tahu siapakah gadis yang ditonton dalam video tersebut. Secara kebetulan, gadis tersebut ialah pelajar yang dilaporkan hilang secara tiba-tiba. Yana mula menyiasat apakah sebenarnya sudah berlaku kepada gadis tersebut.

programme.title: Validasi
programme.desc: Nina dan Muna selalu bertengkar di media sosial untuk melihat siapa yang mempunyai pengikut yang lebih tinggi dan siapa yang mengumpul like yang lebih banyak. Persaingan mereka bertukar menjadi buruk apabila sikap buruk Nina dan Muna mula terbongkar.

programme.title: Kamu Nanyea Kenapa Kita Saling Cinta
programme.desc: Monica adalah anak pembantu di rumah Vino. Mereka memiliki status sosial yang berbeza tetapi saling menyukai, namun tidak direstui oleh orang tua Vino. Adakah cinta mereka akan bersatu?

programme.title: Teman Sejati Yang Menjadi Duri Dalam Pernikahanku
programme.desc: Pada mulanya, Mona mengalu-alukan peluang bekerja sebagai setiausaha Tomi, suami kepada Nindi kawan baiknya. Bagaimanapun, keadaan berubah apabila Mona dimenangi oleh kebaikan Tomi dan mereka memulakan hubungan sulit tanpa pengetahuan Nindi.

programme.title: Barakallah Ep8

programme.desc: An ace in the barge business makes money by selling his name, is falsely accused of embezzling billions. He fights to reclaim his stolen life from those tied to him solely by name.

programme.title: Fist & Furious
programme.desc: A former detective grants permission to a freelance video journalist to cover his revenge journey on a mob boss whom previously killed his partner during an investigation.

programme.title: The Accidental Detective
programme.desc: A crime-enthusiast blogger and a veteran detective team up to prove the innocence of their mutual friend who's been framed for a horrific murder.

programme.title: Actionhero

programme.title: Miracle: Letters To The President

programme.title: Always

programme.desc: A man tries to find the killer of his sister and seeks revenge by enlisting the help of a medium.

programme.title: The Magician
programme.desc: A talented young magician falls for a princess betrothed to his former teacher, leading to a fierce showdown between the two powerful magicians.

programme.title: Waiting For Rain
programme.desc: An unmotivated student regains his passion for life after exchanging letters with his childhood friend and promise to meet if it rains on December 31st each year.

programme.title: Villain & Widow
programme.desc: Widow Yeon-ju rents out the second floor of her home to a novelist. The neighbors suspect the novelists true identity as he spends an inordinate time whenever he's left home alone

programme.title: More Than Family

programme.title: A Man Of Reason

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: Kyung-mi with hearing impairment trying to save another girl from a killer becomes the prey herself. As the killer gains trust from the police, a life-threatening chase begins...

programme.title: Going By The Book

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep100
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4922
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2222
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3856
programme.desc: Stylish Man The Chef is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep217
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4925
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartels turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brothers hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: Liang Kun is a skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world to protect his lover. However, his disappearance leads to her tragic death and as Liang Kun finds a way to survive in the martial arts world, he fights back to avenge his lovers death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: A school bus accident kills almost everyone on board. The bus driver got injured and partially lost his memory while rescuing one of the boys. To thank the driver, the boys dad, Wang, brings him to live with the family in their basement. However, the driver soon discovers strange behaviours from the Wangs which seem to be related to the accident.

programme.title: Wolf Hiding
programme.desc: A cold-blooded killer, Chen An vows to take revenge for her sister who was killed by a crime gang. Dealing with the police and the triad at the same time, a final battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then

programme.title: Secret Diary of a Mom To Be, The
programme.desc: A high-flying PR manager and her loving husband swear by a childless lifestyle but she is shocked to learn that she is expecting just when things look bright for a promotion! How would they deal with the unexpected surprises that life throws in their way?

programme.title: Back Home
programme.desc: Wing has been able to see ghosts since young. When his mothers suicide attempt forces him to return to Hong Kong and the home he ran away from, he discovers that the horrific visions that once haunted him have become worse. Caught between the living and the dead, Wing must bring the truth to light to be free.

programme.title: A Writer's Odyssey
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name, this is the story about a father who must kill a novelist in order to find his missing daughter. Through a strange twist of fate, the fantasy world of the novel begins to impact life in the real world.

programme.title: Deception of the Novelist
programme.desc: This is a sexy thriller adapted from the hit story by the famous internet author, Xxharuki. A self-help book author Xu lives happily with his wife Jeana and their son. However, when a voluptuous and seductive tenant rents their apartment upstairs, Xus life is turned upside down.

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his fathers death

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Social Distancing
programme.desc: Cherry is a young girl addicted to the internet. After seeing a warning video about an e-ghost on YouTube, she begins to encounter many mysterious incidents, and the e-ghost also takes control of her family. Cherry must face her unbearable past in order to get out of this horrifying paranormal world...

programme.title: Time Still Turns the Pages
programme.desc: High school teacher Cheng recalls his violent childhood memories when he finds an anonymous suicide note in the classroom. While he has to prevent the tragedy involving a suicidal student from happening, he also has to face a series of family problems with his wife wanting to divorce him and his fathers serious illness.

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack

programme.title: Lonely Eighteen
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s Hong Kong, Elaine and her best friend Ying enter the entertainment industry hoping to change their fates from poverty. Ying soon becomes a popular porn star but Elaine is lost between being her true self and an actress. When show business declines after a decade, their choices lead them to two different paths in life.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughters diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: I Love Hong Kong 2013
programme.desc: Sung Chi Hung and Ha Shek Lam worked at a Chinese restaurant when they were young and both fell in love with the owners daughter, Yeung. Sung and Yeung eventually got married and took over the restaurant. Many years later, Sung meets Ha who is now a real estate tycoon and plans to buy out the restaurant. Can Sung save the restaurant?

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: Kung Fu Fighter
programme.desc: Ma goes in search of his father in Shanghai. Inheriting his fathers physical strength, Ma gets hired by a boxing club and befriends Fatty. As a result of Fatty using fake notes to bet at the triads boxing club, both of them are hunted down by the gangsters. Luckily they are saved by some martial arts masters but the fight has only just begun.

programme.title: Break Up Club
programme.desc: Joe (Jaycee Chan) is a 20-something slacker who only takes one thing seriously: his on-and-off girlfriend Flora (Fiona Sit). After their latest breakup, Joe goes to an audition for a documentary by director Barbara Wong (the director, playing herself). Handed a camera, Joe records his discovery of a magical website that reunites him with Flora at the price of breaking up his best friend (Patrick Tang) and his girlfriend. However, despite the efficiency of the website, Joe's refusal to change his immature ways and Flora's attraction to a talented graffiti artist (Hayama Hiro) threatens to break them up once more.

programme.title: Reunion Dinner
programme.desc: Chao Yang and Zi Hong are soon to wed but both have not met the other's parents. When a client requests for a livestream of their reunion dinner to promote his products, it set the stage for their parents' first meeting. Estranged from his mother, Yang decides to rent a family for the dinner which results in a series of mishaps and hilarity.

programme.title: I Believe
programme.desc: Chu Chu has been waiting for her first love for 10 years but he marries someone else in the end. As she loses faith in love, she meets a wedding planner and a handsome and rich man, who both help her get over her ex-boyfriend. As Chu Chu feels the same love from them, she must make up her mind. Who will she choose in the end?

programme.title: God of Gamblers 2
programme.desc: A new chapter of the highly successful "God of Gamblers". The legend's disciple Andy Lau is now rising in the gambling world as the "Knight of Gamblers"; clashing with another gambling icon, the wild psychic Stephen Chow (aka "Saint of Gamblers") who wants to follow the God. They mix like oil and water in a series of tricks and mishaps, but are forced to join hands against their master's nemesis on the gambling table.

programme.title: One Second
programme.desc: Directed by renowned director Zhang Yimou, the film is set during the Cultural Revolution, where a common man escapes a labour camp to find a newsreel that captures his daughter for one second in a movie. On the way, he encounters an orphan who also seeks the movie reel. Can the man finally pass the reel to a projectionist and screen the movie?

programme.title: Ip Man 3
programme.desc: When some gangsters led by a ruthless American property developer force a school to sell their land, Ip Man fights to protect it. Subsequently, Ip Man is challenged by another Wing Chun master Zhang Tian Zhi for the Grandmaster title. Ip Man accepts the challenge for the sake of his family and disciples, and wins the duel for the title.

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderellas adventure has just begun!

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: Qian, a rich boy obsessed with martial arts, joins a Kung Fu school where he meets and falls for the youngest daughter of the school master. Being a normal student, he meets a mysterious man who teaches him kung fu that allows him to win a duel and marry his love. It is then that the mysterious man's identity is finally revealed.

programme.title: Back Home
programme.desc: Wing has been able to see ghosts since young. When his mothers suicide attempt forces him to return to Hong Kong and the home he ran away from, he discovers that the horrific visions that once haunted him have become worse. Caught between the living and the dead, Wing must bring the truth to light to be free.

programme.title: Marrying Mr Perfect
programme.desc: Winnie is dumped by her boyfriend in her late twenties and unknowingly meets Koo, a ruthless tycoon in business and a playboy. Koo temporarily switches identities with his driver for security reason and falls for Winnie as she is the first girl to love him for who he is. What will happen when Winnie know Koos real identity?

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Set 500 years before the Monkey King Wu Kong wreaks havoc in the heavenly kingdom, the movie tells the story of how Wu Kong who, unwilling to bow to his own destiny, sets out to rebel against the gods.

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. Another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Lin finally battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brothers death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rongs hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: THE AMOROUS LOTUS PAN
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husbands playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sisters wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: Demon of the Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mo's man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: Threatened by the Yuan who are closing in to rule the whole of China, a band of Song survivors band together to save their prime minister. This bold and fearless heroes fighting for their cause are led by international star, Lo Lieh (Glass Tears, Killer Clans) and Shi Szu (Lovers Destiny), who must fight their way out of trap after trap. But they can't escape them all, and eventually the two end up in prison... it is either death or a fight to the end!

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: The legendary hero Wu Sung is sent to a prison in Meng province after murdering his adulterous sister-in-law and her lover. While in prison, the officer Shih En spares Wu the humiliating baton punishment. Owing Shih a favour, Wu decides to help Shih get his restaurant back at all costs when it was forcefully taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Jenny Hu and veteran co-star Margaret Tu Chuan join longtime0020idol Paul Chang Chung in a battle against the notorious Black Falcon crime mob in Singapore. Together they have to face forgery, fire, and even poisoned needles to stop the mob.

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: To Kill a Jaguar
programme.desc: Set in 1920s Shanghai, a village girl journeys to the big city in search of her father and meets her childhood friend Jaguar, who works for the mob boss Kam. In a world controlled by the mobs, it is a test of survival for all as Jaguar allies himself with ace gunman Ko Tang, to take over Kams empire.

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Lis new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed The Invincible Fist is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: David Chiang plays the all-new one-armed hero - a man who chops off his right arm rather than live with dishonor. When the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend is murdered by the evil gang, it is time to battle.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperors death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: Let's Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They get into a misunderstanding at the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to use her to act as his fianc, in order to drive away two women whom he does not like

programme.title: Lady With A Sword
programme.desc: Swordswoman Feng tries to find a group of villains responsible for her eldest sister's death, but is shocked to discover that her fianc, Jin, is one of them. At the same time, Jin's mother and the two other killers are planning to kill Feng. Can Feng fight back and take her revenge?

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charns beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dongs concubine as he knows Dongs adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: Magnificent Wanderers
programme.desc: Lin and his two friends are traveling patriots who vow to stand up against violence and fight for justice. They meet a rich young man Chu by chance one day and the four become best friends. When a foreign prince plots to possess Chus family fortune and goes after him, Lin and friends go all out to help Chu fight against the villain.

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: Descendant of the Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Tang Peng Nan are a sweet couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan at a time when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he found that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Los brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hus house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hus pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bats knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit

programme.title: The Female Prince
programme.desc: Hsiao's stepmother frames her fianc Lung when he refuses to forfeit their engagement and sends him to prison. To save him, Hsiao disguises as Lung to take the Imperial exam and ranks first place. Impressed by Hsiao, the Emperor weds the Princess to 'him'. When Hsiao comes clean on their wedding night, she persuades the Princess to follow a plan

programme.title: Return of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas pursuit.

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women give birth to baby girls by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.desc: Four individuals become unintentionally embroiled in the mistaken kidnapping of a child, who happens to be the son of a local Mumbai gangster.

programme.title: Jeet
programme.desc: Karan, a feared hitman, falls in love with Kajal but she is married off to Raju. However, when Raju plans to expose his father's illegal activities, Karan is hired to kill him.

programme.title: Sangdil Sanam
programme.desc: Kishan and Sanam are engaged as children but are separated when his father is accused of a robbery. Later, a grown-up Kishan sets out to claim Sanam as his bride unaware that she is a changed person.

programme.title: Daag - The Burning Fire
programme.desc: Bobby and Bhagyamati fall in love but realise afterwards that their respective fathers are sworn enemies to one another. They are forced to elope with tragic consequences.

programme.title: Izzatdaar
programme.desc: When Brahm Dutt, a wealthy businessman, is falsely convicted on murder charges, he enlists the help of a boy to exact revenge from Indrajeet, his cruel son-in-law and the cause of all his miseries.

programme.title: Dil Hai Tumhaara
programme.desc: Shalu, a feisty young girl, falls in love with her employer's son, Dev. However, she decides to sacrifice her love after learning that her own sister, Nimmi, is also in love with him.

programme.title: What The Fish
programme.desc: Sudha hands over the responsibility of her house and pet fish to her niece's fiance before leaving for a holiday. When she returns, all seems fine until she opens the bathroom door.

programme.title: Captain
programme.desc: A group of soldiers head out on a dangerous mission into a forest to uncover a mystery. However, they soon discover that they are in over their heads.

programme.title: Bumm Bumm Bole
programme.desc: Pinu, a young boy, misplaces his sister, Rimzim's shoes at a vegetable shop. Fearing his parents, Pinu asks Rimzim to use his pair of shoes until their father can afford new ones.

programme.title: Dil Hai Tumhaara
programme.desc: Shalu, a feisty young girl, falls in love with her employer's son, Dev. However, she decides to sacrifice her love after learning that her own sister, Nimmi, is also in love with him.

programme.title: Ek Aur Bol Bachchan
programme.desc: Rehman and his sister move to Bheemarajapuram, where a local landlord employs him at his house. He introduces himself as Ram but later has to face severe trouble to keep up this lie.

programme.title: Choron Ka Chor
programme.desc: A fearless outlaw offers to safeguard the daughter of his accomplice in return for a map to a secret diamond mine. However, his quest is compromised after a bandit gets wind of the secret map.

programme.title: Double Attack
programme.desc: An innocent software engineer lands in trouble due to his lookalike, a righteous vigilante. When they become aware of each other's existence, they team up against an evil politician.

programme.title: Kunwara
programme.desc: Raju and Urmila meet in New Zealand and fall in love. However, when Raju helps a pregnant woman with a jilted lover, he ends up sabotaging his own love life.

programme.title: Under Siege
programme.desc: When a turncoat CIA agent and his mercenaries seize a Marine battleship to obtain the nuclear warheads, the only person aboard that can save the ship is a former Navy SEAL.

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: The attempted assassination of the American President is told and re-told from several different perspectives.

programme.title: RV
programme.desc: A forced family vacation in a recreational vehicle rapidly turns into a disaster.

programme.desc: Four horror and science fiction segments, directed by four famous directors, each of them being a new version of a classic story from Rod Serling's landmark television series.

programme.desc: A Mossad agent fakes his death so he can re-emerge in New York City as a hair stylist.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Non-stop excitement and an undercurrent of romance punctuate the story of a student who gains spider-like powers.

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You
programme.desc: When their father passes away, four grown siblings (Jason Bateman, Tina Fey, Adam Driver, Corey Stoll), bruised and banged up by their respective adult lives, are forced to return to their childhood home and live under the same roof together for a week, along with their over-sharing mother (Jane Fonda) and an assortment of spouses, exes and might-have-beens. Confronting their history and the frayed states of their relationships among the people who know and love them best, they ultimately reconnect in hysterical and emotionally affecting ways amid the chaos, humor, heartache and redemption that only families can provide-- driving us insane even as they remind us of our truest, and often best, selves. Comedy director Shawn Levy (Date Night)helms the hilarious script by Jonathan Tropper based on his own best-selling novel.

programme.title: Food Factory S6 Ep8
programme.desc: Food Factory gears up for the best fiesta ever with chili and cheese tamales, tequila margaritas, guacamole-flavoured Guacachips, and citrus and cinnamon flavoured Mexican wedding cookies.

programme.title: The Green Planet S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Seasonal Worlds - Journey with Sir David Attenborough into the magical hidden world of plants.

programme.title: Great Asian Railway Journeys S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Penang to Cameron Highlands - Michael rides one of the steepest and fastest funicular railways in the world and steps into a tropical paradise as he releases exotic specimens at Malaysia's first butterfly sanctuary.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S4 Ep1
programme.desc: The Bahamas gets pounded by 200mph winds during category 5 Hurricane Dorian, the most intense cyclone the country has ever seen. A mother and her baby are forced to swim through shark infested waters.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Life in Dark Water Ep2
programme.desc: In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Heat Ep3
programme.desc: Go to extremes, from the Sahara to the outback, where animals are teaching us how to survive in our heating world. Shelter in caves with chimps, see camels sip salt water, and listen as zebra finches sing to their eggs to make their chicks smaller.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 3 - Lost World of the Yucatan Ep1
programme.desc: The rainforest meets the Caribbean in this breathtaking region of eastern Mexico. Journey into impenetrable jungle, dive deep into mysterious underwater caves and wade through lush everglades that shelter Mexicos largest predator: Morelets crocodile.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Autumn Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn in Africa brings opportunities. Cape Fur seals, Samango monkeys, chameleons, impala, and more respond to the season. Autumn triggers changes in the lives of many animals. Rare creatures reveal themselves and predators gather to take advantage.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Winter Ep4
programme.desc: Be an eyewitness to the death and resurrection that winter brings to Africa. Observe what comes with shorter days, from drought conditions to frigid winds, and marvel at the survival skills of animals and plants as they face the seasons fury.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 3 - Riddles of the Dead Ep1
programme.desc: The Black Rhino is the most endangered species in the world and when they start dying in rapid success, Ol Pejeta brings their expertise to help figure out whats killing thembefore its too late.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - Rules of the Game Ep2
programme.desc: Young hyenas compete in tug of war, mischievous parrots play at picking apart tourists cars, and Atlantic spotted dolphins enjoy sophisticated social games amid seaweedall following specific rules that hone social bonds.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 - A Sloth Bear's Dilemma Ep4
programme.desc: In a land of searing summer heat and thunderous tropical storms, life for all that live on the plains of southern India is tough. But this year its harder than ever as the monsoon rains are late to arrive. For Bibi, a female sloth bear with two young cubs, this will be the biggest challenge of her life. With no rainfall, food will be hard to find and her cubs are also open to attack from leopards and other bears. Bibi must guide her family through this tricky time. Does she have the experience for them all to survive?

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Bound By Blood Ep1
programme.desc: The southwest corner of New Zealands South Island is hemmed in by giant mountains and the rough Pacific Ocean. Rare penguins are locked in a daily game of cat and mouse with giant New Zealand sea lions. The sea lions also live in a tumultuous world, where pups must battle the elements to survive.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Life in Dark Water Ep2
programme.desc: In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Creatures of the Night Ep7
programme.desc: Flying squirrels leaping through the air is quite a sight - especially for researchers who know theyre not supposed to be here. The Southern flying squirrel, typically found along the shores of Lake Erie, is now moving its territory up towards Lake Ontario and beyond thanks to warmer winters.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Bound By Blood Ep1
programme.desc: The southwest corner of New Zealands South Island is hemmed in by giant mountains and the rough Pacific Ocean. Rare penguins are locked in a daily game of cat and mouse with giant New Zealand sea lions. The sea lions also live in a tumultuous world, where pups must battle the elements to survive.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 3 - Arc of Baringo Ep2
programme.desc: Ol Pejeta must help move eight giraffes to a newly opened wildlife area on an island several hundred kilometers away. How do you move the tallest animals on the planet?

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Back from the Dead Ep8
programme.desc: Sometimes animals get a second chance. Like the majestic elk, which went extinct in Ontario thanks to habitat loss and over-aggressive hunting. But a few years ago, hundreds of elk were brought back, to re-populate the province in four different areas. Some floundered because of new, aggressive local predators. But a colony of elk in Burwash, on a former prison ground, is thriving.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - A Tale of Two Penguins Ep1
programme.desc: At the waters edge a brave group of male penguins gather, preparing to make the dangerous journey ashore. With many threats ahead, there is safety in number and these petite penguins have important business to attend. Its time to breed and they must find a burrow before the females arrive.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 - Rana: Queen of the Jungle Ep5
programme.desc: One of the most iconic animals on Earth stalks the jungles of India: the Bengal Tiger. Over the course of a single day, we follow the fortunes of one mother and her three young cubs. She must provide enough food for her family to stay alive.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Ice Ep4
programme.desc: Trek to the planets quickly melting poles, where animals are giving scientists clues about our future existence. Learn how the movements of polar bears, penguins, and other arctic creatures could help humans map (and prevent) global warming.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 3 - Wild Heart of Sierra Gorda Ep2
programme.desc: In the heart of central Mexico lies Sierra Gorda, one region made up of many worlds. Climb skyward from 300 to 3,000 metres above sea level, beginning in the low hills of an ancient semi-desert up into a dense green cloud forest that abounds with bobcats, pumas and flying squirrels.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Autumn Ep3

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Scent Detectives Ep5
programme.desc: A Labrador cross and its partner help prevent ecological disaster in Canada, a Lagotto Romagnolo unearths a rare delicacy in Washington forests, and a Belgian malinois team tracks down the critically endangered geometric tortoise to save the species.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner 1 - Sea of Serpents Ep1
programme.desc: Begin on Rathlin, where flightless guillemot chicks take a leap of faith and golden hares welcome the dawn. Head to Tory to see basking sharks, dolphins, and the endangered corncrakes dance of love. Then chase adorable Irish stoats across Achill.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 3 - Flight of the Pachyderms Ep3
programme.desc: The vets encounter a difficult predicament when a large elephant wanders off and ends up in a local village in an agitated state. If they cant find a helicopter to help with herding immediately, they will have to have the elephant shot.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue 1 - Episode 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Enjoy the spring baby boom at the center as the staff go gaga over an adorable bundle of baby possums. Then see the rescue team hit a rooftop patio for a little R and R: retrieving and rescuing a mama and her ducklings perched high above the city.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - Untamed West Ep2
programme.desc: New Zealands West Coast is like nowhere else on Earth. From glacier-covered mountains to rain-drenched native forests to rough frigid seas, the landscape defies belief. Isolated from the rest of the world, this strip of almost untouched wilderness hides a host of endemic animals. Evolutionary castaways, every one of them is a rare ecological jewel. From alpine parrots and shy penguins to mammal-like kiwis and ancient eels. To survive the conditions the wildlife here has to be hardy, cunning and resourceful. A journey along the West Coast reveals the beauty of this land, and the trials and tribulations of the wildlife that live here.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 - Youngsters of the Desert Ep6
programme.desc: A young lion cub must survive as his family is torn apart; two adolescent leopard cubs must fend for themselves after they are abandoned, and a young adult blackbuck must risk life and limb as he tries to secure his first mating.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Grasslands Ep5
programme.desc: Explore one of Earths most vital but overlooked habitats and learn how grasslands could slow climate change by soaking up more carbon than forests do. Meet key species, such as bison and pumas, that could restore this resource and heal our planet.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 3 - Costa Rica: Sky to Sea Ep3
programme.desc: Costa Rica is a world of its own - a tropical corridor squeezed between two great oceans, powered by raging rivers and simmering volcanoes. As its volcanoes erupt, they deposit minerals into the soil, making the land fertile and creating the countrys rich biodiversity.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Scent Detectives Ep5
programme.desc: A Labrador cross and its partner help prevent ecological disaster in Canada, a Lagotto Romagnolo unearths a rare delicacy in Washington forests, and a Belgian malinois team tracks down the critically endangered geometric tortoise to save the species.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner 1 - Sea of Serpents Ep1
programme.desc: Begin on Rathlin, where flightless guillemot chicks take a leap of faith and golden hares welcome the dawn. Head to Tory to see basking sharks, dolphins, and the endangered corncrakes dance of love. Then chase adorable Irish stoats across Achill.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Grasslands Ep5

programme.title: Macaque Island 1 - The Young Up-Start Ep1

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 3 - Flight of the Pachyderms Ep3
programme.desc: The vets encounter a difficult predicament when a large elephant wanders off and ends up in a local village in an agitated state. If they cant find a helicopter to help with herding immediately, they will have to have the elephant shot.

programme.title: Olivia Ep26

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep23
programme.desc: Go Gadget James And Maxi - Maxi is jealous of all of James' gadgets, or more precisely, the attention the other cars give him. He persuades Molecom to devise some gadgets for him with hilarious results

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep24
programme.desc: Mr Carburettor Or Bust - Mr Carburettor has commissioned a bust of himself for Silver Hatch. Disaster strikes when it is dropped, Big Chris tries to make amends, while Marsha distracts Mr Carburettor and the reporter

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep23
programme.desc: Why Lion Roars - You see there was a time when Lion had lost his roar. Crocodile was snapping at all the animals in the Waterhole and Lion opened his big mouth but nothing came out! Tiny Flea tells Lion that if he dares to enter the Great Cave of Tinga Tinga then maybe he will find his roar. Lion plucks up courage and goes into the Great Cave. He roars with all his might, but a bigger roar comes back! Lion stands strong. He roars again and an even bigger roar comes back. Lion's very own Echo! He has found his roar! From that day on Lion always roars with pride, showing any beast who's the real King of Tinga Tinga. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep24
programme.desc: Why Zebra Has Stripes - Zebra was once very easy to spot in Tinga Tinga as he was bright white all over. This very annoying as all he wanted was to be left alone to munch on yummy grass and get fat. One day, Eagle arrives at the Watering Hole with a new pair of sharp talons saying that she found them in the Great Cave. The animals excitedly rush to find something for themselves. Zebra accompanies Tortoise and the Monkeys into the Cave where they discover the last remaining item; a plain black coat. The Monkeys persuade Zebra to try it on. By holding in his stomach, Zebra manages to get the coat on but it is extremely tight and the black coat starts to rip. In fact, the more Zebra eats the more the coat rips until Zebra has a stripy black and white coat which he is extremely proud of. Not only that, his new stripes make him very difficult to spot amongst the tall grasses of the plains. Finally, Zebra can eat as much grass as he likes and not be spotted by the other animals!

To make Burn jealous, Turbo dresses up as a girl and pretends to be Chet's new girlfriend.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep39

Using their wits and some Icelandic troll knowledge, the Wanderers must find a way to turn these mischievous creatures back to rock.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep624
programme.desc: The Fish Pond - Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep625
programme.desc: The Olden Days - Mummy Pig shows Peppa and her friend Suzy Sheep old photographs from when they were babies. Peppa and Suzy don't remember being that young but are pleased to see that they've always been best friends.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep626
programme.desc: Snowy Mountain - Peppa and her friends are on Snowy Mountain learning how to ski. Their teacher, Madame Gazelle is very good at skiing and was once a world champion! But in the end it is Mummy Pig who impresses everyone...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep150
programme.desc: The Talking Flower - Anna would like to paint a new picture, and Ron his favourite flower: Jaunita. When Anna starts to paint Ron and his flower, Christopher hides behind a bush to trick him and make him believe the flower is a talking back to him.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep151
programme.desc: The Amazing Guesser - After performing a backyard magic show with Ron, Christopher convinces himself that he actually has magical guessing powers! Christopher utilizes the help of Bubu and Ron to surprise the surprisers when they wake up!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Pizza / Bread - Tiny Chef makes pizza and learns that friendship is more important than toppings when Ruby eats all the basil! // Tiny Chef bakes bread but forgets to watch his rising dough and needs to think fast when the dough grows too big!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep306
programme.desc: Paddington and the Solar Eclipse/Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor - Paddington has a race against time in order to enjoy his first ever solar eclipse. // Paddington accepts an inventor's award for Simi when she's too shy to step up, but why does she then feel jealous and sad?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Paddington's Puffling Rescue - Paddington and the Browns rescue pufflings who, instead of taking their firs flight, get lost around the campsite.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep722
programme.desc: The Ice Treasure - After discovering an ice road that leads to a giant ice treasure, Blaze, AJ, Watts and Gabby go an adventure to find out what's inside! But to get to the treasure, they'll have to dodge all of Crusher's chilly cheats along the way!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Pups in a Jam / Pups Save a Windsurfing Pig - Its the annual Jamboree Jamfest, but all of the fruit is carried off by ants! It's up to the pups to lure the ants to safety. // Zuma is on a wacky water rescue after Cornelius the pig goes for a ride on a windsurfing board.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1001
programme.desc: Pups Save the Wacky Water Skiers / Pups Save the Mayor's Assistant - When Emmy and Eddie take a joyride, Hurricane Harrigan and Cap'n Turbot get caught water skiing behind the out of- control boat. // Daring Danny X becomes Mayor Humdinger's assistant, and builds a theme park! A jealous Humdinger sabotages the rides.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Pups Save a Dolphin Pup - Dolphin Pup accidentally swims into a shallow water stream! Now its up to Ryder and PAW Patrol to get her back into the Bay.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road - The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Caf / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess - Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Caf Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Rainbow's Lost Colors / Boots' Rubber Band Ball - The twins are excited to see their first rainbow, but it's missing its colors! Dora sets off to return its azul, rojo, y amarillo. // Boots' rubber band ball bounces into the Forest Next Door, and he must ask Cynthia the Centipede to get it back.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Lucky Necklace / Vigo's Surprise - Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else. // Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Tour Fishies / Sorry Not Sorry - When Finnegan Travelfins leaves Carnivore Cove out of his travel guide, Baby and William make a video to show off their town! // Shadow's insincere apologies put a strain on his friendship with Bait and Switch.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Muddy Puddles - It's raining and Peppa is sad because she can't go out to play. When the rain stops, Peppa feels better and she and George get ready to play one of their favorite games - jumping in mud puddles!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Mr Dinosaur is Lost - George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Best Friend - Peppa Pig's best friend, Suzy Sheep, comes over to visit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Polly Parrot - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house, and meet their new parrot, Polly.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Pancakes / S'Mores - Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula. // Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Ah! My Beautiful Castle / The Sand Is Disappearing - During a bike ride, the Barbapapa family discovers an old medieval castle in ruins. // Barbapapa and Lolita were traveling in a balloon, but caught in a storm they ended up stranded on a deserted island.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Birth Of Barbapapa / The Reveal - Young Franois witnesses the birth of Barbapapa. // Barbapapa is a prisoner in a zoo.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep722
programme.desc: The Ice Treasure - After discovering an ice road that leads to a giant ice treasure, Blaze, AJ, Watts and Gabby go an adventure to find out what's inside! But to get to the treasure, they'll have to dodge all of Crusher's chilly cheats along the way!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep721
programme.desc: Flying Robot Rescue - When Crusher's robot sends Crusher and Pickle far-far away, it's up to Robot Blaze and Robot Sparkle to rescue them using coding!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep822
programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitties and the Kiddies / Pups Save the Green House - Mayor Humdinger babysits his new friend's children, but trouble arises when they start feuding with his kitties. // When Mayor Goodway and Mayor Humdinger gets accidentally locked in a greenhouse and need rescued from an exotic plant inside.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep823
programme.desc: Pups Save the Floating Goodways / Pups Save the Portable Pet Wash - The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable. // Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Baby Tooth / Slobber Slug - When Baby Shark loses his tooth for real, he and William team up with an unexpected ally to track it down. // A game of Barnacle Ball turns into a rescue mission after Hank's pet rock, Rocky, is hit into the Lair of the Slobber Slug.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Bbarbalalalalalala / The Biodisaster - Barbalala and the family life! / Barbabright and Barbabeau have designed a huge wooden toy powered by an engine using bio oil.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep323
programme.desc: Paddington's Adventure Club Cracks The Case! / Paddington And Aunt Lucy's Special Recipe - Paddington and his friends set out to help PC Wells solve the case of the missing Windsor Ruby. // Thanks to Aunt Lucy's Special recipe the Browns set up a takeaway business from their home, but it's hard work!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Croc-A-Bye Baby / Wanna Eampaada? / If The Boot Fits / Piata Party - Dora and Boots babysit some rowdy crocs. // Dora and Boots get the Troll to try an empanada at Benny's stand. // Boots tries new wacky new boots that Tico invented. // The twins have their first piata party, but no one can figure out how to open it.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep722

programme.title: Choices - Dare to dream
programme.desc: Body positivity and self love: embracing your own beauty - When she looks in the mirror, Akanksha Sood Singh feels shame. The successful filmmaker and mother of two loves her life but hates her body. A flawless figure and unblemished skin - the Indian beauty standards of perfection are unattainable. How can she escape that pressure?

programme.title: Eco Africa
programme.desc: The Environment Magazine - How can we improve urban air quality? In Nairobi, activists collect air pollution data to press the authorities to act, while a French city offers free public transport to cut emissions. Plus: Cutting single-use plastic and cleaning up Lake Victoria.
